para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns="http://www.evaluescience.com/schemas/forms" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://www.evaluescience.com/schemas/forms" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:complexType name="Form"> <xs:sequence> <xs:any namespace="##targetNamespace" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> </xs:any> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:element name="form" type="Form"/>
<xs:complexType name="Hidden"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:anySimpleType" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType>
<xs:element name="hidden" type="Hidden"/>
</xs:schema>
